entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (itp_hethrir_main.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_20: Your actions are true to the Empire. I have mentioned you to others, and Captain Thrawn has requested your services. I consented. See to him.
entries.s_32: The Rebels are planning an attack on one of our bases on Talus. Go help defend that base.
entries.s_34: What kept you? The information retrieved by Inquisitor Loam Redge has details about various Rebel operations. You are going to thwart them.
entries.s_39: The Rebels are planning an attack on one of our bases on Talus. Go defend that base.
entries.s_43: I'm afraid I only have orders I have are for those on active duty.
entries.s_44: The function of this base is not of your concern. I would suggest you make yourself scarce.
entries.s_46: I do not have need of one such as yourself. Please speak with Inquisitor Loam Redge.
